name: Out My Highway!
description:
code by Ogofkop and assets by PtitWazo,     sfx from inert

For this 3rd microStudio game Jam, we made a game that's fun for 3 players! 

The goal is to be the first one to reach 333 points.  Collect obstacles that have your player's color and avoid the other ones!

Included in this game:

  • Dogs
  • Palm trees
  • 100% homemade, organic assets*
  • True color shifting
  • Couch multiplayer (you don't need the couch)
  • Future FREE updates! because every AAA game say that when they're missing features

*apart from sfx (+ they don't seem to be working on firefox unfortunately)

Required setup:

  • A phone
  • 3 fingers

Optimal setup:

  • A smartphone
  • 3 fingers from 3 different people
